email.description: The email address of the user.

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the template used in the push uninstall event.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the push uninstall event occurred.

platformEndpoint.description: The platform endpoint used for the push uninstall event.

isGhostPush.description: Indicates if the push uninstall event was a ghost push.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign associated with the push uninstall event.
